definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Shimian County in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
Shimian County in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
quilted cotton trousers/cotton-padded trousers (worn in winter)

sentences.english: Aim To determine aftereffect in the degradation of cotton cellulose.
sentences.chinese: 研究棉纤维素的辐射降解的后效应。

sentences.english: Bald eagles and ospreys roost in the old cottonwoods that line the gravel shores.
sentences.chinese: 秃鹰和鱼鹰在砾石河岸边的棉白杨林中栖息下来。

sentences.english: Genuine Italian woven cotton elastic provides stretchability for more comfort.
sentences.chinese: 真正的意大利棉梭织弹性提供更舒适的拉伸。

sentences.english: These luxurious and soft egyptian cotton hipsters are great in both comfort and support.
sentences.chinese: 豪华柔软的埃及棉，能提供最好的舒适度与支持度。

sentences.english: Oh， the picture is so lovely. Is it made of 100% cotton?
sentences.chinese: 啊，图案真是太可爱了。是100%棉的吗？

sentences.english: They bought many scarf, cotton windcheater and leather shoes.
sentences.chinese: 他们买了围巾，棉风衣和皮鞋。

sentences.english: For example, a company is thinking about launching cotton shirts as their new product.
sentences.chinese: 例如，公司正在考虑发布棉衬衫的新品。

sentences.english: Effective methods to identify natural colored cotton from dyed cotton have not been found.
sentences.chinese: 现在对天然彩色棉和染色棉没有很好的鉴别方法。

sentences.english: Within the filler are high quality PP cotton, good elasticity.
sentences.chinese: 内填充物均为高品质PP棉，具有良好的弹性。

sentences.english: Imported. overview Supersoft and comfortable french rib knit cotton crewneck.
sentences.chinese: 概述超软，舒适的法国罗纹针织棉圆领。

sentences.english: His mother quilted a cotton-padded anorak for him.
sentences.chinese: 他的母亲给他缝制了一件棉猴儿。

sentences.english: Worn clothing and feed roller bearings.
sentences.chinese: 针布破损和给棉罗拉轴承坏。

sentences.english: Interior organic cotton, exterior weather-resistant nylon fabric.
sentences.chinese: 内部是有机棉，外部是抵御冰冷气象的尼龙原料。

sentences.english: Mother Cotton-Tail began to make cookies and Tippy Toes rolled them out for her.
sentences.chinese: 棉尾巴妈妈开始做饼干，歪脚趾负责帮她把饼干擀平。

sentences.english: Blend fabric of wool and cotton is ideal material.
sentences.chinese: 棉毛混纺是理想的料子。
